verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> Now it came to pass in the seventh בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> with him came יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> [that] Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֣ה <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <S%H476><s%> of Elishama מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> of the seed הַ֠מְּלוּכָה <S%H4410><s%> royal וְרַבֵּ֨י <S%H7227><s%> and the princes הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> even ten אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> men אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpah וַיֹּ֨אכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> and there they did eat שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> Mizpah

וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> Then arose יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֜ה <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and the ten הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַ֠יַּכּוּ <S%H5221><s%> that were with him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <S%H1436><s%> Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֧ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וַיָּ֣מֶת <S%H4191><s%> and slew אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הִפְקִ֥יד <S%H6485><s%> had made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> him whom the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> over the land

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <S%H3064><s%> all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אִתּ֤וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1436><s%> that were with him [even] with Gedaliah בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> at Mizpah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> and the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נִמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> that were found שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> there [and] the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> also slew יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> And it came to pass the second לְהָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> after he had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדַלְיָ֑הוּ <S%H1436><s%> Gedaliah וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and no man לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> knew

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> That there came אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H376><s%> men מִשְּׁכֶ֞ם <S%H7927><s%> from Shechem מִשִּׁל֤וֹ <S%H7887><s%> from Shiloh וּמִשֹּֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <S%H8111><s%> and from Samaria שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> [even] fourscore אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מְגֻלְּחֵ֥י <S%H1548><s%> shaven זָקָ֛ן <S%H2206><s%> having their beards וּקְרֻעֵ֥י <S%H7167><s%> rent בְגָדִ֖ים <S%H899><s%> and their clothes וּמִתְגֹּֽדְדִ֑ים <S%H1413><s%> and having cut וּמִנְחָ֤ה <S%H4503><s%> themselves with offerings וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <S%H3828><s%> and incense בְּיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> to bring בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [them] to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַ֠יֵּצֵא <S%H3318><s%> went forth יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> And Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֤ה <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah לִקְרָאתָם֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> from Mizpah הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> all along הָלֹ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> as he went וּבֹכֶ֑ה <S%H1058><s%> them weeping וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּפְגֹ֣שׁ <S%H6298><s%> and it came to pass as he met אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> them he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to בֹּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> unto them Come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam ס

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> turned כְּבוֹאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> And it was [so] when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֞ם <S%H7819><s%> slew יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <S%H3458><s%> that Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָה֙ <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> them [and cast them] into the midst הַבּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> of the pit ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> But

וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> But ten אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> men נִמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> were found בָ֗ם וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> among them that said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> unto Ishmael אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּמִתֵ֔נוּ <S%H4191><s%> Slay כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> us not for we have לָ֤נוּ מַטְמֹנִים֙ <S%H4301><s%> treasures בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field חִטִּ֥ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וּשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> and of barley וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and of oil וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and of honey וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <S%H2308><s%> So he forbare וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הֱמִיתָ֖ם <S%H4191><s%> and slew בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> them not among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> their brethren

וְהַבּ֗וֹר <S%H953><s%> Now the pit אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <S%H7993><s%> had cast שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> in it יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> wherein Ishmael אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּגְרֵ֣י <S%H6297><s%> all the dead bodies הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> of the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִכָּה֙ <S%H5221><s%> whom he had slain בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> because גְּדַלְיָ֔הוּ <S%H1436><s%> of Gedaliah ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> had made הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אָסָ֔א <S%H609><s%> [was] it which Asa מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> for fear בַּעְשָׁ֣א <S%H1201><s%> of Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִלֵּ֛א <S%H4390><s%> filled יִשְׁמָעֵ֥אל <S%H3458><s%> [and] Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֖הוּ <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah חֲלָלִֽים׃ <S%H2491><s%> it with [them that were] slain

וַיִּ֣שְׁבְּ ׀ <S%H7617><s%> carried away captive יִ֠שְׁמָעֵאל <S%H3458><s%> Then Ishmael אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <S%H7611><s%> all the residue הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּמִּצְפָּ֗ה <S%H4709><s%> that [were] in Mizpah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> [even] the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <S%H7604><s%> that remained בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> in Mizpah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִפְקִ֗יד <S%H6485><s%> had committed נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <S%H5018><s%> whom Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֑ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam וַיִּשְׁבֵּם֙ <S%H7617><s%> carried them away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and proceeded לַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> to go over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon ס

וַיִּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> that [were] with him heard יוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3110><s%> But when Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> of all the evil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> that Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> Then they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> with Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֑ה <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah וַיִּמְצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> and found אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> him by the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1391><s%> that [are] in Gibeon

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְא֤וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> Now it came to pass [that] when all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> were with יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> which [were] with Ishmael אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <S%H8055><s%> that [were] with him then they were glad
